example.description: Returns details of all of your load balancers in the currently configured default region for the shell.
Returns details of all of your load balancers in the us-west-2 region.
Returns details of the specified load balancer (which must exist in the currently configured default region for the shell).
Returns details of the specified load balancer which was created in the us-west-2 region.
Returns details of the specified load balancers which were created in the us-west-2 region.
Returns details of all of your load balancers across all standard regions.
